member.name: T:Senkel.IO.Serialization.FileDeserializer
member.summary: Represents a deserializer that is capable of deserializing an object from a file using an initially set object and an deserializer.

member.name: M:Senkel.IO.Serialization.FileDeserializer.#ctor(Senkel.IO.Terminals.IFileTerminal,Senkel.Serialization.IStreamDeserializer)
member.summary: Creates a new instance of the class that uses the specified object for deserializing and the given for reading files.
member.param: The terminal to use for reading files.
The deserializer to use for deserializing files.

member.name: M:Senkel.IO.Serialization.FileDeserializer.Deserialize``1(System.String)
member.summary: Deserializes an object of the specified type from the file at the specified path determined by an object.

member.name: M:Senkel.IO.Serialization.FileDeserializer.Deserialize(System.String,System.Type)
member.summary: Deserializes an object of the specified type from the file at the specified path determined by an object.

member.name: T:Senkel.IO.Serialization.FileSerializer
member.summary: Represents a file serializer that serializes files based on an initially set object and an serializer.

member.name: M:Senkel.IO.Serialization.FileSerializer.#ctor(Senkel.IO.Terminals.IFileTerminal,Senkel.Serialization.IStreamSerializer)
member.summary: Creates a new instance of the class that uses the specified object for serializing files based on their paths.
member.param: The terminal that is for writing to files.
The serializer to use for serializing files.

member.name: M:Senkel.IO.Serialization.FileSerializer.Serialize(System.String,System.Object)
member.summary: Serializes the given object into the file at the specified path determined by the initially set object and creates the parent directory of the file unless it already exists.
